S1 -> 2 S2 @ k1 * S1 * compartment
2 S2 -> S1 @ k2 * S2 * S2 * compartment

Initial conditions:

Amount of S1              1.5 10^-4   mole
Amount of S2              0           mole
Parameter k1              0.35        second^-1
Parameter k2            180           litre mole^-1 second^-1
Volume of compartment     0.3         litre
